Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are promising distributed generation technologies for their controllability and efficiency.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: Traditional SOFCs are controlled as a current source to deliver predefined power to the grid.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: Since a microgrid can operate in both grid-connected mode and islanded mode, grid-forming control ability is required for SOFCs to achieve voltage/ frequency regulation.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: However, when subjected to load transients, nonlinear output characteristics of SOFCs would probably lead to the collapse of dc-link voltage and unintentional disconnection of SOFCs.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: To deal with this issue, grid-forming control for SOFCs is presented considering nonlinear characteristics between output current and voltage.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: The maximum power point (MPP) of SOFCs is tracked using proposed incremental impedance (INI) method and dc-link voltage difference is delivered to adjust output frequency of ac side.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: In this condition, stable operation and load sharing can be achieved simultaneously during load transients.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method

Sentencas: Simulation results based on PSCAD/EMTDC are provided to validate the effectiveness of proposed grid-forming control.
Titulo: Grid-Forming Control for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells in an Islanded Microgrid Using Maximum Power Point Estimation Method
